title: Market Capitalization and Valuation Metrics of Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc

content.text: Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc has a market capitalization of $X million, which is in line with the industry average market capitalization of $Y million.
When comparing Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc's valuation metrics with industry benchmarks, the following ratios are considered:
Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc's P/E ratio is Z, compared to the industry average ratio of W. This suggests that the stock may be overvalued or undervalued relative to its earnings.
The P/S ratio of Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc is A, while the industry average is B. This ratio indicates the stock's valuation relative to its revenue and can help assess its growth potential.

Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc's P/B ratio is C, which is higher or lower than the industry average ratio of D. This metric compares the stock's market value to its book value and can indicate if the stock is overvalued or undervalued.
The EV/S ratio of Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc is E, while the industry average is F. This ratio takes into account the company's debt and cash to evaluate its value compared to revenue.
Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc does not currently pay dividends, so the dividend yield is not applicable.
Other relevant valuation metrics, such as price-to-free cash flow and price-to-earnings growth ratio, are not available or applicable for Fennec Pharmaceuticals Inc.
